data.title: RavData Innovation Consulting
data.meta_description: RavData Innovation Consulting Israel high-tech northern Israel tech map
data.text:
We provide an array of services and products all around the discipline of New Products Development (NPD)

For startups/entrepreneurs and small and medium manufacturing industry – we are providing comprehensive consulting and business development services for new product development. This includes general training and guidance, technological consulting, marketing strategy, investment recruiting, IP strategy, networking with possible partners and suppliers, submitting applications to Israel Innovation Authority and more.

We work with MAOF (Israel Small Businesses Agency - SBA), which means very affordable prices. For small and medium manufacturing industry we may work with MAOF but also may provide the same services thru the Israel Innovation Authority (which means even more affordable prices).

For large scale heavy R&D manufacturing industry enterprises – we exclusively represent in Israel the leading and most comprehensive Innovation Management and Strategy Execution software – Sopheon Accolade. This is like a full-scale ERP system dedicated to R&D and New Products Development, based on the Stage-Gate® methodology as well as other state of the art Innovation Management methodologies.
